_comment: Data breaches are INCIDENT_RESPONSE scenarios, not DATA_PRIVACY. INCIDENT_RESPONSE always escalates (see decision_engine.py line 430-435). Risk score 0.706 correctly classified as HIGH.
title: Healthcare HIPAA Data Breach Report
description: Healthcare company reporting a data breach requiring HIPAA notification

task.description: Report a data breach involving patient PHI to HHS and affected individuals under HIPAA breach notification requirements
